      • connect

        public static byte[] connect(String identifier)
                      throws IOException
        Create a CONNECT MQTT message.
        Returns:
        The resulting MQTT package.
        Throws:
        IOException
        UnsupportedEncodingException

      • disconnect

        public static byte[] disconnect()
                         throws IOException
        Create the DISCONNECT MQTT message, it has no variable header or payload and it doesn't use any other attribute of the fixed header than the type.
        Returns:
        The resulting MQTT package.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • publish

        public static byte[] publish(String topic,
             byte[] message)
                      throws IOException
        Create a PUBLISH MQTT message with QoS AT_MOST_ONCE and message ID 0.
        Parameters:
        topic - Which topic to subscribe to.
        message - The message to send.
        Returns:
        The resulting MQTT package.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • subscribe

        public static byte[] subscribe(int message_id,
               String subscribe_topic,
               int subscribed_qos)
                        throws IOException
        Create a SUBSCRIBE message, it has a QoS of AT_LEAST_ONCE.
        Parameters:
        message_id - The message id of the subscribe, handled by the client.
        subscribe_topic - The topic to which the client wants to subscribe.
        subscribed_qos - The wanted QoS for the subscription, can be AT_MOST_ONCE, AT_LEAST_ONCE, or EXACTLY_ONCE.
        Returns:
        The MQTT package.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • ping

        public static byte[] ping()
                   throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

        public static MQTTMessage decode(byte[] message)
